author: Naushad K. Cherrayil
title: Etisalat offers free eLife services for three months to stay entertained at home
description: Subscribers can also upgrade to eLife unlimited plan starting from 250Mbps free of cost for three months
content:
UAE-based telecom operator Etisalat is offering free eLife services for three months to stay connected and get entertained at home due to coronavirus outbreak.
TechRadar Middle East reported about two-week ago that the telco is planning to offer the Life ser… [+638 chars]
